comments.author: Aaron Donovan
comments.body: I've attached a test that exercises the bug and a corrected File.java

comments.author: Aaron Donovan
comments.body:
I went from not deleting enough blocks to deleting too many which is really a much bigger problem.  
The attached test and fix work well.

comments.author: Andi Vajda
comments.body:
Your changes were integrated and committed (rev 394214).
Please, please, please, in the future when sending fixes in, send a proper patch as generated by svn diff. Thanks.

description: JEDirectory is not deleting files properly.  Blocks are left behind due to an error in cursor operations.
